member.summary: Perform validation on lost focus.

member.summary: Perform validation on every key press.

member.summary: Specifies the mask format.

member.summary: Excludes the prompt character and literals in value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskFormat.IncludeLiterals
member.summary: Includes only the literals in value.

member.summary: Includes only the prompt character in value.

member.summary: Includes the prompt character and literals in value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint
member.summary: Enumerated value that describes why the input character was rejected.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.AlphanumericCharacterExpected
member.summary: Operation failed. An input character was encountered that was not alphanumeric.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.DigitExpected
member.summary: Operation failed. An input character was encountered that was not a digit.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.LetterExpected
member.summary: Operation failed. An input character was encountered that was not a letter.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.SignedDigitExpected
member.summary: Operation failed. An input character was encountered that was not a signed digit.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.UnavailableEditPosition
member.summary: Operation failed. There were not enough edit positions available to fulfill the request.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.SkipLiterals
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to reenter literal values.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color that describes the border stroke color of the MaskedEdit .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture information associated with the masked text box

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.CutCopyMaskFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether literals and prompt characters are copied to the clipboard.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.ErrorBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a border stroke color shown when the validation was failed.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.FontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the font for the MaskedEdit text.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.FontAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the font for the MaskedEdit text is bold,italic, or neither.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the font family for the text of the MaskedEdit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.HasError
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the mask is succeeded.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.HorizontalTextAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment for the text of the MaskedEdit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets the mask used to validate input as the user types. The mask must be a string composed of one or more of the masking elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.MaskType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of mask elements used to validate the user input.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.PromptChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to represent the absence of user input in MaskedEdit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.HidePromptOnLeave
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the prompt characters in the input mask are hidden when the masked text box loses focus.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.TextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for the text of the MaskedEdit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.ValidationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the input validation mode of the MaskedEdit.

member.summary: Gets or sets the raw value of the control.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.ValueMaskFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the value formatting option of the MaskedEdit.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit.Watermark
member.summary: Gets or sets the watermark text shown when the MaskedEdit. Value is null or empty.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the watermark text.
